task.title: Schedule a mobile automated test on TestCloud

context.p: With the mobile application uploaded and the associated mobile test project configured in , you can schedule automated test executions on the application with .

step.cmd: Sign in to Katalon TestOps and go to your Project.
Go to Test Execution and click Schedule Test Run.
step.stepresult: The Schedule Test Run dialog appears.

step.cmd: Select the repository containing the mobile test project you want to execute from Script Repository.
In the Environment section, click on the dropdown menu and select More options.
Switch to the Mobile Native App tab.

image.alt: Assign test environment for test suite.

step.cmd: Select the mobile environment for your tests.
Return to the Schedule Test Run dialog and click Schedule.

stepresult.p: You are directed to the Test Run List page, where you can see the scheduled execution with the configured environment.
You can click on the play icon to manually trigger the test run.
To check the progress of your test runs, see: .

taskbody.result:
You are directed to the Test Run List page, where you can see the scheduled execution with the configured environment.
You can click on the Play icon to manually trigger the test run.
To check the progress of your test runs, see .
